property_title: Top floor T0  with sea view in the center of Cabanas.
property_description:
Top floor T-0 apartment in the heart of Cabanas and 150 meters from the sea and promenade, with a unique roof terrace with 66m2 with sea views and 360º views

Nestled in the heart of the charming and vibrant Cabanas de Tavira, this exquisite apartment offers a unique opportunity to experience the best of coastal living. With a prime location just a short walk from the stunning Praia de Cabanas, this property is a true gem awaiting its new owners.

Step inside this cozy apartment, where you'll find a well-maintained space boasting a bright and airy atmosphere. The open-plan layout seamlessly connects the living area to the fully furnished kitchen, creating a perfect space for relaxation and entertaining. With 3 terraces one facing North, one facing South and  and a roof terrace whit 66m2 offering panoramic views of the village and sea.

The apartment features one bathroom and a spacious house area of 35,96, perfect for a comfortable and stylish lifestyle. With a convenient location near a plethora of dining options, from the renowned Estrela do Mar to the inviting Wine House Tapas Bar, you'll never be far from delicious meals and delightful experiences.

property_description:
Great-value, key-ready apartment available to purchase next to the Autódromo Internacional do Algarve Racetrack in Portimão.

This is a one-of-a-kind opportunity to gain an affordable investment in the property market in Portugal. As part of a fully-operational, successful rental programme, owners can choose their own usage and then earn income when they're not using their home, thanks to the increasing popularity of the AIA, which host events all-year round.

Sold fully furnished, this three bedroom home comprises a spacious living room in open plan with a dining area, three large bedrooms, two bathrooms and a fully equipped kitchen, complete with appliances, including a stovetop, oven, fridge, water boiler, toaster and washing machine. The private terrace offers views of the countryside.

All apartments offer convenient access to a large outdoor swimming pool, and usage of facilities at the next door hotel, including an indoor pool, fully equipped gym, sauna, spa, bar and restaurant.

Additional features include: air conditioning, Wi-Fi, double glazed windows, underground parking and storage room.

Situated less than 20 minutes from Portimão city centre, with its vibrant culture, entertainment, and shopping, and 25 minutes to stunning Meia Praia beach. The city centre of Lagos can be reached in approximately 25 minutes.

property_title: One bedroom Penthouse at  Pestana Alvor Atlântico
property_description:
Located in the popular Pestana Edificio Alvor Atlântico you are instantly greeted by a bright and airy living space, perfect for relaxing after a day of exploring the nearby beaches and dining options.

This comfortable penthouse includes  a bedroom with built-in wardrobe, 1 bathroom with bathtub, a balcony with sea views overlooking the Três Irmãos beach and a fully equipped kitchen perfect for preparing delicious meals using fresh ingredients from the nearby market.
There are also common leisure areas where you will find a sauna, Turkish bath, indoor pool and access to an outdoor pool.

For those who love dining out, Alvor offers a variety of culinary experiences within just a 15-minute walk, and with two stunning beaches just minutes away you'll never be far from the sun, sand, and surf.

Sold Furnished.

When buying a property with Pestana you are buying a property on a well maintained resort, serviced and organized by professionally trained staff employed by the largest Tourism Company in Portugal and one of the top 150 Hotel chains worldwide.

Built to the highest standards all Pestana properties are purchased with Golf Rights, resort discounts and the Pestana Guest Card, allowing discounts and privileges across the whole Pestana Group.

Whether you're seeking a peaceful beach getaway or a vibrant culinary adventure, this apartment invites you to experience Alvor's unique blend of natural beauty and modern conveniences. Don't miss the opportunity to make this property your own. Contact us today to schedule a viewing.

property_title: Modern 1-Bedroom Duplex Apartment in Faro with Private Terrace and Parking
property_description:
Modern 1-Bedroom Duplex Apartment in Faro with Private Terrace and Parking

This 1-bedroom apartment, located on the first floor, offers a unique opportunity for those seeking comfort and functionality, with the added benefit of being convertible into a 4-bedroom property. Designed with a generous open-plan layout, it seamlessly integrates the living room and kitchen into a harmonious, air-conditioned space that feels both cosy and modern.

The kitchen is fully equipped with state-of-the-art appliances, backed by an initial two-year warranty, extendable to five years, ensuring quality and durability. High-end finishes include false ceilings with recessed lighting and multicolour LED mouldings, adding a contemporary and stylish touch. The apartment is also pre-wired for home automation, enhancing convenience, and features tilt-and-turn double-glazed windows and electric shutters for thermal comfort and efficiency.

The en-suite master bedroom is air-conditioned and includes a spacious closet, offering excellent storage. Recently renovated, the property has undergone significant upgrades to its electrical and plumbing systems. Additional features include a laundry area with a water heater and access to a private terrace with an extra bathroom, perfect for leisure and privacy.

Energy efficiency is ensured by solar panels, which not only reduce energy costs but also generate income from surplus energy sales. The apartment also provides private parking, adding convenience and security to your daily routine.

Situated just 2.5 km from Fórum Algarve and 10 minutes from Faro Airport, this property enjoys a prime location with easy access to all essential amenities and city services.

With its modern design, energy efficiency, and strategic location, this apartment is the perfect choice for a personal residence or investment. Contact us today to schedule a viewing and discover this unique property.
